<div>\n  <div>\n   <b>DSM – Bright Science. Brighter Living.™<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Royal DSM is a global, purpose-led, science-based company active in Nutrition, Health and Sustainable Living. DSM’s purpose is to create brighter lives for all. DSM addresses with its products and solutions some of the world’s biggest challenges while simultaneously creating economic, environmental and societal value for all its stakeholders – customers, employees, shareholders, and society at large. DSM delivers innovative solutions for human nutrition, animal nutrition, personal care and aroma, medical devices, green products and applications, and new mobility and connectivity. DSM and its associated companies deliver annual net sales of about €10 billion with approximately 23,000 employees. The company was founded in 1902 and is listed on Euronext Amsterdam.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <br> \n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <div>\n   <b>Job description:<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   We are looking for an EP Patent Attorney specialized in chemical process technology and polymer chemistry to support the Intellectual Property (IP) department of DSM Engineering Materials (DEM). DEM is a world leader in high-performance and increasingly sustainable thermoplastics. The materials enable lighter, stronger and more durable products – which in turn makes people’s lives safer, more convenient and healthier – and all while helping to tackle carbon emissions. Within DEM, a small team of IP professionals provides global IP services. The team located in Geleen works closely together and is looking for an enthusiastic European Patent attorney.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   In this position, you will assist in securing, protecting and actively building the IP position of DEM. As our new colleague you will deal with a broad variation of IP topics including creation of IP rights, ensuring freedom-to-operate, support in negotiations around IP in business deals and in strategic decisions around innovation and the direction hereof, mapping out competition and business opportunities and acting as a true business partner to the DEM organisation.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Your Key Responsibilities:<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Draft, file and prosecute patent applications worldwide.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Represent the organisation in oral proceedings before the EPO (examination and post-grant proceedings).<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Manage a global patent portfolio and report out to different functions in the organisation on different IP aspects.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Draft various opinions on patentability and risks assessments, including opinions for (in)validity and freedom to operate. <\u002Fli>\n   <li>Create and enhance IP awareness within the organisation through training and defining and implementing IP guidelines and procedures.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Define and support in enforcing the IP Strategy.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Advise on research, cooperation, licensing and non-disclosure agreements and support in negotiations with third parties.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Monitor and report on patent activities of competitors and customers. <\u002Fli>\n   <li>Be a business partner and participate in bridging IP with the rest of DEM organisation.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>You Bring:<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>You have a University degree in Chemistry or Chemical process engineering field, or strongly related fields.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>You are a qualified European Patent attorney, with EQE post-qualification patent attorney experience in private practice or industry (preferred) in the chemical sector. Holding both EQE and national patent attorney qualifications may be an advantage. Almost EQE qualified candidates will also be considered.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>You have excellent communication and language skills in English (written and spoken). Any other language, e.g., Dutch\u002FGerman may be an advantage.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>You have a customer-oriented approach with good technical, analytical and organizational skills. In your work you focus on results, and you are able to manage your planning and set priorities.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>You have a sense for detail but also for the big picture.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>You have strong communication, social skills and team spirit. <\u002Fli>\n   <li>High degree of self-initiative and flexibility. <\u002Fli>\n   <li>Willing to work at least partially in the office in Geleen.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>We Bring:<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Attractive working conditions and self-development opportunities.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Friendly, open, and informal work atmosphere.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>High degree of freedom to organize your work.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>A team of diverse employees who are not afraid to think outside of the box.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>A truly global and collaborative team that cares about the experience of our customers.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>A caring and supportive environment where you’re empowered to grow and share your ideas.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Procedure &amp; Contact<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Interested in this position? Please apply on-line by sending us your CV &amp; Motivation letter in English via the career portal. For additional questions, please contact recruiter Britto Antony (britto.antony@dsm.com). Reference check procedures are part of the DSM Recruitment &amp; Selection Process. You will be contacted when these references checks are required.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <br> \n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <div>\n   Royal DSM is an equal employment opportunity and affirmative action employer, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, protected veteran status, status as a qualified individual with a disability, or any other characteristic protected by law.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <div>\n   <b>Bring your passion. Build the future.<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Do you want to contribute to delivering high quality products to our customers? Do you enjoy empowering and enabling people to be the best that they can be now and in the future? Do you want to make your career in an international food company? Then this may be the opportunity for you!\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Our Quality department is looking for a Global Quality Manager Operations EU-NA-AUS.\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   DSM Food &amp; Beverage is a leading global supplier of food enzymes, cultures, taste and health ingredients and other specialties. We do this for many of the leading global and local dairy, baking, beverage and savory food brands. Our advanced ingredients help our customers to differentiate their products with great taste, texture and appearance and optimize their production processes. We also embraced the Food System Commitments to achieve accessible, affordable, healthy nutrition and healthy livelihoods within our planet’s boundaries. DSM Food &amp; Beverages expects to grow through mergers and acquisitions and as a business continuously develop. This means an exciting and challenging place to be.\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   You are part of the Quality Leadership of DSM Food &amp; Beverages, and you are responsible for managing the world wide quality operations teams. You will translate the DSM Food &amp; Beverages quality strategy towards operations and engage our quality people to drive best in class performances.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Key-responsibilities<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Develop QA operations strategy, tactical quality plans and programs\u002Fprojects and ensure their execution and adherence to organization objectives;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Drive Continuous improvement, complaint and incident reduction through stimulating and developing QA performance measurement capability;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Drive Continuous improvement through review of KPI’s, Quality losses, internal audits, CAPA plans, project and regular quality reviews with sites to fine tune priorities;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Develop and execute QC strategy together with Food Safety &amp; Quality Governance Manager;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Support and challenge site QA\u002FQC budgets and plans – in line with Quality strategy supporting customer demands and manufacturing;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Coach Site QA\u002FQC managers, Develop talent, optimize organizational development;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Develop, implement and enforce procedures, standards &amp; methods, in line with DSM QA strategies, DSM operational requirements, DSM Policies and procedures and external requirements;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Develop and implement Quality programs and initiatives in line with product compliance and customer requirements;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Support sites in implementing (new) standards;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Resolve escalated incidents and complaints arising\u002Finvolving operations and require coordination with other departments. Support and take final decision in case of escalated decision with respect to release\u002Fscrap involved product;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Support incident troubleshooting and problem solving, support in Root causes assessments, and focus on preventive actions in whole organization;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Set-up and Maintain QA network, exchange of best practices, create the learning organization between sites;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Provide support during internal, customer and regulatory audits at the sites;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Be an active contributor and stimulate others to deliver added value to business, operations and other disciplines with respect to quality;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Advocate Food Safety and Quality culture at all times;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Decomplexify where possible;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Improve customer awareness, to drive down complaints, reflect the voice of the customer.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>We which you can develop yourself and your team to the next level;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>A good Collective Labor Agreement and competitive salary;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Besides 25 paid holidays, a possibility to buy additionally up to 13 extra holidays once full time employed;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>A membership at a newly equipped gym on site for a small fee per month.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <div>\n cross-functional teams, internally and externally;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Proficient in English and Dutch, other languages are assets.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <div>\n   <b>DSM – Bright Science. Brighter Living.™<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Royal DSM is a global, purpose-led, science-based company active in Nutrition, Health and Sustainable Living. DSM’s purpose is to create brighter lives for all. DSM addresses with its products and solutions some of the world’s biggest challenges while simultaneously creating economic, environmental and societal value for all its stakeholders – customers, employees, shareholders, and society at large. DSM delivers innovative solutions for human nutrition, animal nutrition, personal care and aroma, medical devices, green products and applications, and new mobility and connectivity. DSM and its associated companies deliver annual net sales of about €10 billion with approximately 23,000 employees. The company was founded in 1902 and is listed on Euronext Amsterdam. More information can be found at www.dsm.com.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Project Engineer Electrical &amp; Instrumentation<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   <b>Drive improvement. By providing broad and in-depth project engineering expertise in your field in all phases of the projects. In this role you will report to the Sr. Project &amp; Portfolio Manager. We offer a hybrid workplace with the office located in \n   <b>Emmen<\u002Fb>.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <i>Are you a person driven by a continuous improvement mindset? Are you a real team player building strong relationship with disciplines within different backgrounds to realize an effective approach and realization of projects and feasibility studies? Do you have strong customer focus and communicator on all levels and are you a sparring partner for peers and stakeholders? Then apply now!<\u002Fi>\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Your key responsibilities<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Responsible for input of appropriate professional engineering knowledge in your field in all phases of projects. For specific monodisciplinary projects in your field of expertise you will also lead the projects yourself.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ensuring that projects run within budget, on time and accident-free.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Taking on time pro-active, corrective actions when quality, SHE or costs are at stake.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Providing engineering expertise in large capital and improvement projects. <\u002Fli>\n   <li>You will document, file, and ensure on time and accurate communication to the stakeholders.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>You will be responsible for and leading contractors.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ensuring the integrity of process and equipment in terms of SHE and Q as project result.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Evaluating the effectiveness of the executed projects and define corrective actions if necessary.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Promoting a positive SHE mindset internal and external in compliance with all regulations, and a proactive approach towards SHE, focused on monitoring unsafe situations.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>About us<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   DSM Engineering Materials is a global supplier of high-performance engineering thermoplastic solutions. It has a focused portfolio, with global leadership positions in many of its products such as Stanyl®, Arnitel® Akulon® and Arnite®. DSM Engineering Materials addresses key markets in automotive and electronics, and provides solutions to specialized industries including water management, breathable textiles, and flexible food packaging. Our products are very technical with a broad range of specifications and potential application areas. We sell into dynamic target markets with customers operating in complex value chain contexts and with an increasingly global approach. At DSM Engineering Materials, we make bold progress and put customers first. You are invited: bring your passion and build the future!\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>We Bring<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>The opportunity to identify value and generate opportunities within our production facility in Emmen.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>A team of diverse employees who aren’t afraid to think outside of the box.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Global and multidisciplinary collaboration between other production facilities of DEM and the Innovation department.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>The encouragement you need to develop and achieve.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>A role in which you can make an actual difference by driving continuous improvement strategies.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>A caring and supportive environment where you’re empowered to grow and share your ideas.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>You Bring<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Bachelor or master’s degree in Electrical\u002FInstrumentation Engineering.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Minimum of 5 years of work experience in operations, engineering, or project engineering within the process industry.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Proven project engineering, problem solving and analytical skills.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Experience in project management in an operational environment preferable as project leader.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Technical engineering knowledge of the plant and the process.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Good command of the Dutch, German, and English language or willing to learn.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Our recruitment processes<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Interested in this position? We are looking for exceptional candidates to join the team in the capacity of Procurement Contract Manager. This position will implement and realize the strategy for Direct Spend for the Category, within corporate requirements and guidelines, in order to ensure results on all KPI’s as defined within DEM, and to contribute to the overall result for DSM. There will be 10-20% travel, which could including international travel.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>The Position<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Contribute to the Direct Spend strategy development and represent Direct Spend in the Category.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Develop and deploy vision and approved plan for his\u002Fher Category.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Lead development and implementation of the strategy for Direct Spend in the Category and assign priorities for sourcing projects\u002Fresponsible for category strategy development.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Define and validate the global sourcing strategy for the Category, using Strategic Sourcing Methodology (SSM).<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Take a strategic and long-term view of DEM Purchasing in identifying and developing innovative sources and contractual arrangements. Accountable for internal and external analysis in collaboration with Contract Managers, as chairman of a cross-functional sourcing team.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Prepare and lead fact based negotiation and select strategic suppliers.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Direct contract implementation activity with regional contract managers and resolve issues.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Manage\u002Fevaluate contract compliance, and supplier performance and take necessary corrective actions.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Develop and ensure implementation of risk mitigation strategy in the various regions .<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Participate in supplier audits with Supplier Quality Manager.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Key account management for Key suppliers\u002FDevelop and manage relationship with key suppliers and track their performance.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>The Ideal<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Education requirement: Bachelor’s degree in an Engineering and\u002For business discipline (Master's degree preferred).<\u002Fli> \n   <li>5–8 years of experience in supply chain and\u002For procurement with a global company.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>B2B experience a strong plus.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Energetic, self-starter with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects in a fast-paced environment.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Result-oriented and strong analytical skills.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Strong systems knowledge, including reporting tools like SAP, SAP BW, and MS Office Suite.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Excellent communication, interpersonal and negotiation skills, as well as, relationship building skills.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>The Reward<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Working for DSM means the opportunity to really contribute to improve people’s lives and solving the challenges of today’s world. Challenging jobs, career opportunities and an inspiring environment allow you to enhance your personal development. DSM recognizes that the on-going success of the company depends on the continued development and engagement of our employees and pursues a fair and competitive remuneration policy, recognizing individual and team competencies and performance.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Procedure &amp; Contact<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Interested in this position? <div>\n  <div>\n   <b>Bring your passion. Build the future.<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   Our manufacturing site in Delft, also known as the Gist Productie Bedrijf (GPB), is the largest plant in the world when it comes to the production of Yeast Extracts for the Savoury market. The GPB also produces Natamycin for Food &amp; Crop Protection, Feed additives and manages several Contract Manufacturing Organizations. One very important aspect is that the GPB also supplies the Delft site with utilities like steam, electricity and chemicals.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   Within the GPB-site there is a vacancy for the position of:\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Reliability Engineer<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   <b>Delft<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>What you will do<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   The GPB-site offers a challenging workplace for a reliability professional, providing a mix of old as well as modern equipment, several large capital projects in the pipeline and a collection of (monumental) industrial buildings that each require their own maintenance strategies.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   As Reliability Engineer you will contribute to optimize the integrity and availability of the installations and buildings while keeping maintenance costs of the plant in control. You will join a team of mechanical and E&amp;I maintenance engineers.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Key-responsibilities<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Lead Criticality Rankings and Failure Mode Effect Analysis (FMEA) for existing and future equipment installations and improve the Preventive &amp; Predictive Maintenance Program (PPM);<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Lead Lifetime Extension (LTE) studies to prioritize and define project scope for replacement of obsolete and end-of-life equipment;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Identify and eliminate (potential) performance killers and cost drivers (added value losses) by analysis of performance data and leading Root Cause Analyses in multi-disciplinary teams;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Work together with vendors and contractors, procurement and the do-maintenance department to improve the quality and efficiency of the maintenance execution process;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Support trainings to production and maintenance personnel to increase levels of user knowledge and ownership;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Participate in the Maintenance &amp; Reliability network to learn and share knowledge with other DSM sites;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Initiate and lead improvement projects using Lean Six Sigma tools and support colleagues with continuous improvement.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>We Bring<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>A safe and inclusive workplace;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>You get to work in a challenging environment where everyone feels involved and takes responsibility;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>A possibility to develop collaboration and project management skills;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>You can contribute to a sustainable way of producing;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>A good Collective Labor Agreement and competitive salary;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Besides 25 paid holidays, a free to spend budget to buy additionally up to 13 extra holidays;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>A membership at a newly equipped gym on site for only 20 Euros per month.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>You Bring<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>You have a Bachelor degree in either Electrical, Civil, Chemical, Process or Mechanical Engineering;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>You have at least 5 years work experience in manufacturing, have technical and operational knowledge and skills;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>You have a cooperative spirit and like to roll up your sleeves as you are result oriented;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>You have Project Management skills and can communicate on all levels of production;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>You do not bounce back from a high workload or difficult challenges;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>You speak fluently Dutch and English. This is a must for this role, due to the close contact with Operators.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>How to apply?<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Interested in this position? <div>\n  <div>\n   <b>DSM – Bright Science. Brighter Living.™<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Royal DSM is a global, purpose-led, science-based company active in Nutrition, Health and Sustainable Living. DSM’s purpose is to create brighter lives for all. DSM addresses with its products and solutions some of the world’s biggest challenges while simultaneously creating economic, environmental and societal value for all its stakeholders – customers, employees, shareholders, and society at large. DSM delivers innovative solutions for human nutrition, animal nutrition, personal care and aroma, medical devices, green products and applications, and new mobility and connectivity. DSM and its associated companies deliver annual net sales of about €10 billion with approximately 23,000 employees. The company was founded in 1902 and is listed on Euronext Amsterdam. More information can be found at www.dsm.com.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>SHE Manager<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   <b>Explore possibilities. Empower people.<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>What you’ll do<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   At this role you will define, implement, maintain, and continuously improve the QESH policy, plans and procedures of DEM Emmen. You will also monitor, audit and report on compliance and progress. Besides that, you will work on integration of two different plant organizations with their own culture and management system into one site management system. It is also important to act as a “liaison” between the Site and Business Unit. At this role you will report to Site Director Emmen.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <i>Are you keen on developing and implementing safety rules and policies, while contributing to continuous improvement in resources? Are you used to work with and on the shop floor and do you have experience in leading health &amp; safety programs? This might be the next step in your career!<\u002Fi>\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Your key responsibilities<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Developing the QESH policy in compliance with DSM’s corporate requirements, national and international laws and regulations, ISO14001 &amp; ISO TS 16949, GMP, FDA &amp; UL94 standards and sustainability requirements. <\u002Fli>\n   <li>Advising and challenging management in translating QESH policy into annual and longer-term QESH plans and in setting priorities and short-term and long-term targets.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ensuring that the international certifications ISO14001 &amp; ISO TS 16949 are maintained.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Monitoring the implementation of QESH policy, the QESH performance and progress of the Unit.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ensuring proper reporting within the Management line, to the Managing Board and to the relevant corporate staff departments.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Organizing and co-execute QESH inspections and audits within the organization. <\u002Fli>\n   <li>Actively supporting investigating QESH incidents and challenging follow up.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Improving lead times and effectiveness of mechanical\u002Fflame analysis to support OTIF improvements.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Managing and coaching the employees in their work and development and support a challenging, customer-oriented environment with high quality standards and a positive working climate.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Being responsible for maintenance of the Q-lab QESH management system and for the training of employees on extrusion, injection, molding, and mechanical testing.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Building long-term relationship with relevant stakeholders (e.g., governmental departments, fire fight brigades, neighbor parties, and knowledge clusters).<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>About us<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   DSM Engineering Materials is a global supplier of high-performance engineering thermoplastic solutions. We have a focused portfolio of products; with each of them it has realized global leadership. DSM is the global number 3 in the overall market for semi-crystalline engineering plastics and is the global market leader in high-temperature polyamides.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   The Site DSM Engineering Materials Emmen produces the polymer Polyamide 6 (Nylon) based on caprolactam in the PA6 plant. This polymer is used in textile and carpet yarns and for domestic, industrial, and electrical applications. Additionally, in the Compound plant, polymers for specific applications are made based on five basic polymers. These polymers are made by adding coloring agents, reinforcing agents, mold release agents, flame retardants or other additives, and are supplied under the name Akulon®, Arnite® and Arnitel®. DAP manufactures raw materials for both plants. The end products are then packaged and prepared for shipment. There are high demands in the field of SHE: DSM achieves an accident-free workplace.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>We Bring<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>A team of diverse employees who aren’t afraid to think outside of the box.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>The encouragement you need to develop and achieve the goals you set.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>A dynamic work environment with an experienced supporting team.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>The chance to move along and develop yourself in constantly growing industry and to make a difference for our stakeholders.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>You Bring<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>MSc degree in sciences.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Knowledge of QESH systems, practices, and audit techniques.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>5-8 years broad international experience in the industry.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Good communication and social skills<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Dutch and English language knowledge.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Being customer and external focused.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Having an innovative and continuous improvement mindset.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>High sense of responsibility.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Our recruitment processes<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Interested in this position? Apply by uploading your CV and motivation letter in English via DSM career website (www.dsm.com\u002Fcareers). The procedure will generally be in line with the DSM application process outlined on the DSM career website. Due to privacy regulations, we can only actively interact with applications via our career portal.\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   For further information, please contact Ignacy Cieślik, Talent Acquisition Business Partner (ignacy.cieslik@dsm.com).\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   Pre-employment screenings are part of the DSM Recruitment &amp; Selection Process. You will be contacted when further information is required\n   <i>. <\u002Fi>In the Recruitment process, we will use the Occupational Personality Questionnaire to provide insight on your learning adaptability, preferred operating style and motivation for this position.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   DSM is committed to ensuring equal employment opportunities for all job applicants and employees. genetic information, protected veteran status, or any other status protected by law.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Managing Scientist Down Stream Processing (C41-42)<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>What you’ll do:<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>As a Managing Scientist in Enzyme House, you will be acting as a Scientist focusing on a particular field of expertise, Down Stream Processing. <\u002Fli>\n   <li>The role is also a member of the R&amp;D Enzyme House leadership team and is responsible for managing a customer-centric team of Scientists and Technicians in the field of Process Technology<\u002Fli> \n   <li>You contribute to the R&amp;D Enzyme House (technology) strategy and policies and you manage a team of ~15 Scientists and Technicians, resulting in engaged staff and optimal use of resources.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>You develop a high performing and customer centric team<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Your key responsibilities:<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Managing the science in the field of Down Stream Processing of Enzymes by development of sustainable downstream processes and product formulations which can be transferred to manufacturing plants in accordance with the DSM quality and safety regulations. <\u002Fli>\n   <li>Perform an active role in shaping projects and opportunities together with our business and manufacturing partners, your upstream process development colleagues and application experts and so translate project goals into concrete and accepted workplans for process and formulation development.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Supporting full scale plants with increasing plant capacity, decreasing variable costs, solving operational issues, while maintaining or improving product quality.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Support the R&amp;D Manager Enzyme House in developing the R&amp;D strategy of the Enzyme House.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Allocation and implementation of the people impacting part of the operational plan in the various groups.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Be the coaching and inspirational people manager for your Team<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Responsible for all the HR aspects concerning your Team, e.g. appraisals and development plan, proposal for promotions, holiday approval, illness.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Quality, Environment, Safety &amp; Health (QESH) related to the customer-centric R&amp;D team<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>You bring:<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>You are a Food, Chemical or Biochemical process Engineer or similar by training. You have experience in Down Stream Processing and people management in Research and Development. You have strong communicating skills and are resilient and flexible.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>We are looking for people with plenty of initiative, who like to learn and work in multidisciplinary teams in an innovative environment. You are an active networker and good communicator, fluent in English. <\u002Fli>\n   <li>PhD knowledge level in Food, Chemical or Biochemical engineering<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Minimum 5 years of experience within science in an industrial setting. Preferably you have experience in people management.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>You have experience with large-scale downstream process technologies such as solid\u002Fliquid separations, membrane processes, and have a proven affinity for drying processes.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Affinity to transfer processes from lab to manufacturing and vice versa and serve as sparring partner for process technologists at the production sites<\u002Fli> \n   <li>You have an in depth understanding of proteins and their physical and biochemical properties which you can apply in the downstream process and formulation design<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Strong leadership skills in team development and coaching (team builder)<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Experience in (life science) R&amp;D, innovation or operations<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Good communication skills in English. Ability to speak French is preferred.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>You have a willingness to travel to the different sites from time to time<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>About the organization<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   The DSM Science &amp; Innovation community is made up of creative thinkers, who thrive in fast-paced environments and continually come up with innovative solutions to meet the changing needs of our customers. Through collaborating with people in different fields and not being afraid to try new things, we innovate exciting new products, processes and solutions. Data and knowledge-driven insights which are unlocked through digital and analytical tools and technologies are hereby key.\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Our R&amp;D Center for Food Innovation (CFI) works for our Business Group Food &amp; Beverages (F&amp;B). We bring together knowledge from consumer, markets, science and technology to create DSM’s innovations in eth Food &amp; Beverages area.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>The Reward<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   We offer a rewarding and challenging job in an open and pleasant atmosphere with many opportunities for personal input, plenty of room for discussions with fellow professionals and personal development. Terms and conditions of employment as well as fringe benefits are up to market standards. Salary depends on your education and experience and is based on the Collective Labor Agreement DSM Gist Services. The job is indicated at level C42. Terms of conditions: local contract (DSM NL)\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>How to apply<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Interested in this position? Due to privacy regulations, we can only actively interact with applications via our career portal.\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   For further information on this position please contact Tetiana Milewska, Talent acquisition Business partner: tetiana.milewska@dsm.com Applications can be directed via the career-portal www.dsm.com\u002Fcareers. You will be contacted when these references checks are required.\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Royal DSM is an equal employment opportunity and affirmative action employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, protected veteran status, status as a qualified individual with a disability, or any other characteristic protected by law.\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Koninklijke DSM is een werkgever die gelijke kansen biedt en aan positieve discriminatie doet, en alle gekwalificeerde sollicitanten worden beoordeeld zonder te kijken naar ras, kleur, religie, geslacht, nationaliteit, leeftijd, beschermde veteranenstatus, status als gekwalificeerde persoon met een beperking, of enige andere door de wet beschermde eigenschap.\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Koninklijke DSM en de hieraan gelieerde ondernemingen genereren een netto jaaromzet van ca. €10 miljard met ongeveer 23.000 werknemers. <div>\n  <div>\n   <b>Bring your passion. Build the future.<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Within the Center for Digital Innovation (CDI), part of DSM Biodata and Translation unit there is a vacancy for the position of:\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Statistician \u002F Data Scientist<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   <b>Delft<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>What you will do<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   DSM is looking for a Statistician\u002FData Scientist to support a cross-functional Global Innovation organization producing nutritional products for feed, food, and personal care applications. As part of the continuing Digital journey for DSM Innovation, you will be based in Delft, the Netherlands and support global Innovation projects in Animal Nutrition, Human Nutrition &amp; Care, Food &amp; Beverages, and Biosciences &amp; Process Innovation.\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   <b>Your key responsibilities<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Lead the statistics, data analysis and visualization work packages in projects from different DSM units (Biosciences &amp; Process Innovation, Food &amp; Beverages, Animal Nutrition &amp; Health and Human Nutrition &amp; Care);<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Design, plan and execute the analysis of design of experiments, response surface models, control charts, regression models, survival models, time series and related statistical models from analytical, genetics, fermentation, application, and quality control labs;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Build exploratory and predictive models using multivariate statistics\u002Fmachine learning\u002FAI methods from high-dimensional biological and bioprocess data, as for example metabolomics or spectral data;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Design data management plans for projects and collaborate with team members and external parties in the creation of databases and their connections with webapps and tools for data analysis;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Guide the development of self-service tools, webapps and collaborate with external parties to build software for data workflows, analysis, and visualization.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Work together with scientists with diverse backgrounds in different projects. Design, plan and execute workplans in those projects. Lead the statistical\u002Fmachine learning expertise in those teams. Communicate findings (reports, presentations, self-service tools) within project teams including project managers and other stakeholders;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Collaborate in building the advanced statistics\u002Fdata analysis\u002Fmachine learning\u002FAI expertise across multiple R&amp;D teams in the Center for Digital Innovation and other sites and business units across DSM;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Follow external developments and evaluate their adoption by expertise teams and their implementation in DSM projects.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>We bring<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>A hybrid workplace that offers flexibility to employees across the business;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>The chance to shape DSM and its impact for years to come;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Diverse employees who aren’t afraid to think outside of the box;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>A team that truly cares about sustainability, each other, and our customers;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>A supportive environment where you’re empowered to grow and share your ideas.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>You bring<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>PhD in Statistics, Data Science or related quantitative discipline field with 2-3 years of additional work experience, or Master’s degree in Statistics, Data Science or related quantitative discipline with 5-6 years’ additional work experience;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Expertise in applied statistics;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Experience in machine learning\u002FAI algorithms is a plus;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Experience in statistical software packages and data visualization tools;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Experience in Python programming. Expertise in building and running workflows and webapp creation tools and libraries is a plus;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Knowledge on setting up data models and databases (SQL, NoSQL) and accessing them using queries is a plus;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ability to work in multidisciplinary teams in multiple projects, with defined roles and responsibilities, in a results-driven environment with milestones and deadlines;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Creative mindset and problem-solving skills;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Excellent written and verbal communication skills with a fluency in English.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>About us<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   The DSM Science &amp; Innovation community is made up of creative thinkers, who thrive in fast-paced environments and continually come up with innovative solutions to meet the changing needs of our customers. Through collaborating with people in different fields and being unafraid to try new things, we innovate exciting new products, processes, and solutions. Data and knowledge-driven insights which are unlocked through digital and analytical tools and technologies are hereby key.\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Our global Center for Digital Innovation (CDI), within the DSM Biodata and Translation unit, works with all of DSM’s Science and Innovation (S&amp;I) programs in Biosciences &amp; Process Innovation, Food &amp; Beverages, Human Nutrition &amp; Care and Animal Nutrition &amp; Health. We bring together data and knowledge from consumer, markets, science and technology, and translate those into insights to accelerate DSM’s innovations.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>How to apply?<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Interested in this position? Please apply on-line by sending us your CV &amp; motivation letter in English. Due to data privacy reasons we do not handle any applications sent by email. Please be so kind to use the link provided.\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   For further information you can contact, Martin Zwart, Senior Talent Acquisition Business Partner (martin.zwart@dsm.com).\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   A Pre-Employment Screening, reference check procedures and assessment can be part of the recruitment process. You will be informed when these procedures are required.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <br> \n  <div>\n   Royal DSM is an equal employment opportunity and affirmative action employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, protected veteran status, status as a qualified individual with a disability, or any other characteristic protected by law.\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Royal DSM and its associated companies deliver annual net sales of about €10 billion with approximately 23,000 employees. At DSM we want to help make existing diets healthier and more sustainable. We are driven to help create foods that people around the world can truly enjoy without compromises.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   The F&amp;B organization of DSM is regularly involved in mergers and acquisitions. A successful merger or acquisition is dependent on the integration or incorporation of master data.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   The complexity of the business and master- and transactional- data in particular is high. Master Data interacts and is linked.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   The main focuses on the following objects: \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   Master data and related transactional data for Materials, Customers, Customer Info Records, Purchase Info Records, Sales representatives, Hierarchies, E-business settings, etc.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Key-responsibilities<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Coordinate the integration of newly required data sets in the F&amp;B SAP legacy system. <div>\n  <div>\n   <b>DSM – Bright Science. Brighter Living.™<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Royal DSM is a global, purpose-led, science-based company active in Nutrition, Health and Sustainable Living. DSM’s purpose is to create brighter lives for all. DSM addresses with its products and solutions some of the world’s biggest challenges while simultaneously creating economic, environmental and societal value for all its stakeholders – customers, employees, shareholders, and society at large. DSM delivers innovative solutions for human nutrition, animal nutrition, personal care and aroma, medical devices, green products and applications, and new mobility and connectivity. DSM and its associated companies deliver annual net sales of about €10 billion with approximately 23,000 employees. The company was founded in 1902 and is listed on Euronext Amsterdam. More information can be found at www.dsm.com.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <div>\n   <b>SHE Manager<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   <b>Explore possibilities. Empower people.<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>What you’ll do<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   At this role you will define, implement, maintain, and continuously improve the QESH policy, plans and procedures of DEM Emmen. You will also monitor, audit and report on compliance and progress. Besides that, you will work on integration of two different plant organizations with their own culture and management system into one site management system. It is also important to act as a “liaison” between the Site and Business Unit. At this role you will report to Site Director Emmen.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <i>Are you keen on developing and implementing safety rules and policies, while contributing to continuous improvement in resources? Are you used to work with and on the shop floor and do you have experience in leading health &amp; safety programs? This might be the next step in your career!<\u002Fi>\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Your key responsibilities<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Developing the QESH policy in compliance with DSM’s corporate requirements, national and international laws and regulations, ISO14001 &amp; ISO TS 16949, GMP, FDA &amp; UL94 standards and sustainability requirements. <\u002Fli>\n   <li>Advising and challenging management in translating QESH policy into annual and longer-term QESH plans and in setting priorities and short-term and long-term targets.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ensuring that the international certifications ISO14001 &amp; ISO TS 16949 are maintained.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Monitoring the implementation of QESH policy, the QESH performance and progress of the Unit.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ensuring proper reporting within the Management line, to the Managing Board and to the relevant corporate staff departments.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Organizing and co-execute QESH inspections and audits within the organization. <\u002Fli>\n   <li>Actively supporting investigating QESH incidents and challenging follow up.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Improving lead times and effectiveness of mechanical\u002Fflame analysis to support OTIF improvements.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Managing and coaching the employees in their work and development and support a challenging, customer-oriented environment with high quality standards and a positive working climate.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Being responsible for maintenance of the Q-lab QESH management system and for the training of employees on extrusion, injection, molding, and mechanical testing.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Building long-term relationship with relevant stakeholders (e.g., governmental departments, fire fight brigades, neighbor parties, and knowledge clusters).<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>About us<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   DSM Engineering Materials is a global supplier of high-performance engineering thermoplastic solutions. We have a focused portfolio of products; with each of them it has realized global leadership. DSM is the global number 3 in the overall market for semi-crystalline engineering plastics and is the global market leader in high-temperature polyamides.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   The Site DSM Engineering Materials Emmen produces the polymer Polyamide 6 (Nylon) based on caprolactam in the PA6 plant. This polymer is used in textile and carpet yarns and for domestic, industrial, and electrical applications. Additionally, in the Compound plant, polymers for specific applications are made based on five basic polymers. These polymers are made by adding coloring agents, reinforcing agents, mold release agents, flame retardants or other additives, and are supplied under the name Akulon®, Arnite® and Arnitel®. DAP manufactures raw materials for both plants. The end products are then packaged and prepared for shipment. There are high demands in the field of SHE: DSM achieves an accident-free workplace.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>We Bring<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>A team of diverse employees who aren’t afraid to think outside of the box.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>The encouragement you need to develop and achieve the goals you set.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>A dynamic work environment with an experienced supporting team.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>The chance to move along and develop yourself in constantly growing industry and to make a difference for our stakeholders.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>You Bring<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>MSc degree in sciences.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Knowledge of QESH systems, practices, and audit techniques.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>5-8 years broad international experience in the industry.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Good communication and social skills<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Dutch and English language knowledge.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Being customer and external focused.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Having an innovative and continuous improvement mindset.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>High sense of responsibility.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Our recruitment processes<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Interested in this position? Apply by uploading your CV and motivation letter in English via DSM career website (www.dsm.com\u002Fcareers). The procedure will generally be in line with the DSM application process outlined on the DSM career website. Due to privacy regulations, we can only actively interact with applications via our career portal.\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   For further information, please contact Ignacy Cieślik, Talent Acquisition Business Partner (ignacy.cieslik@dsm.com).\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   Pre-employment screenings are part of the DSM Recruitment &amp; Selection Process. You will be contacted when further information is required\n   <i>. <\u002Fi>In the Recruitment process, we will use the Occupational Personality Questionnaire to provide insight on your learning adaptability, preferred operating style and motivation for this position.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <div>\n   DSM is committed to ensuring equal employment opportunities for all job applicants and employees. <div>\n  <div>\n   <b>DSM – Bright Science. Brighter Living.™<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Koninklijke DSM is een wereldwijd, ‘purpose-led’ bedrijf dat vanuit wetenschappelijke basis actief is op het gebied van gezondheid, voeding en duurzaam leven. DSM streeft ernaar om de kwaliteit van leven voor iedereen te verbeteren. Met zijn producten en oplossingen gaat DSM enkele van ’s werelds grootste uitdagingen aan en creëert tegelijk economische, milieutechnische en maatschappelijke waarde voor al zijn belanghebbenden – klanten, medewerkers, aandeelhouders en de samenleving in haar geheel. DSM levert innovatieve oplossingen voor voeding, diervoeding, persoonlijke verzorging en aroma’s, medische apparatuur, groene producten en toepassingen, en nieuwe mobiliteit en connectiviteit. DSM en de hieraan gelieerde ondernemingen genereren met ongeveer 23.000 werknemers een netto jaaromzet van ca. €10 miljard. Het bedrijf werd in 1902 opgericht en is beursgenoteerd op Euronext Amsterdam. Meer informatie vindt u op www.dsm.com.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   Binnen de afdeling Maintenance Engineering &amp; Facilities zijn vacatures ontstaan voor:\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Maintenance Technician (MBO-niveau 3)<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   <b>Dagdienst<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>De uitdaging<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   In nauwe samenwerking met collega’s realiseer je een World Class prestatie op het gebied van SHE, kwaliteit, continu verbeteren en Maintenance performance. Vanzelfsprekend staat de veiligheid van jezelf en je collega’s altijd voorop (I care, we care). Je rapporteert aan de Teamleider Uitvoering (Do Maintenance).\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Kerntaken<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Zorgdragen voor een veilige werkomgeving en -omstandigheden binnen verantwoordelijkheidsgebied;<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful>\n  <ul>\n   <li>Realisatie van preventieve en correctieve onderhoudswerkzaamheden (First Time Right) die op World Class niveau voldoen aan kwaliteit, kwantiteit en normen m.b.t. SHE;<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful>\n  <ul>\n   <li>Integriteit van de installaties waarborgen;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Uitvoeren kleine wijzigingen en modificaties aan installaties;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Signaleren en verhelpen van storingen;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Rapporteren van uitgevoerde werkzaamheden in geautomatiseerde systemen (SAP);<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Actief bijdragen aan het continu verbeteren van het onderhoud, de staat van de installaties en het onderhoudsproces;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ondersteunen bij het opstellen van werkinstructies;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Rapporteren van uitgevoerde werkzaamheden in SAP PM;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Is verantwoordelijk om te werken overeenkomstig de eisen uit de vastgestelde Life Saving Rules;<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful>\n  <ul>\n   <li>Proactief bijdragen aan de continu verbeter cultuur en zorgdragen voor realisatie van initiatieven.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>SHE-verantwoordelijkheden<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Verantwoordelijk voor het voorleven van World Class SHE cultuur;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Toezien op naleving van Life Saving <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Heeft een afgeronde opleiding Werktuigbouw (MBO-niveau 3) of gelijkwaardig;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Hoog veiligheids- en kwaliteitsbewustzijn;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Beschikt over kennis van SHE- en kwaliteitszorgsystemen en weet deze in een productieomgeving toe te passen;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Herkent en gedraagt zich in\u002Fnaar de DSM-cultuur kompas: moedig, zorgzaam, collaboratief, verantwoordelijkheid nemen, duurzaamheid stimuleren, waarde bieden;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Beschikt over aantoonbare competenties: vakmanschap, verantwoordelijkheidsgevoel, <div>\n  <div>\n   <b>DSM – Bright Science. Brighter Living.™<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Koninklijke DSM is een wereldwijd, ‘purpose-led’ bedrijf dat vanuit wetenschappelijke basis actief is op het gebied van gezondheid, voeding en duurzaam leven. DSM streeft ernaar om de kwaliteit van leven voor iedereen te verbeteren. Met zijn producten en oplossingen gaat DSM enkele van ’s werelds grootste uitdagingen aan en creëert tegelijk economische, milieutechnische en maatschappelijke waarde voor al zijn belanghebbenden – klanten, medewerkers, aandeelhouders en de samenleving in haar geheel. DSM levert innovatieve oplossingen voor voeding, diervoeding, persoonlijke verzorging en aroma’s, medische apparatuur, groene producten en toepassingen, en nieuwe mobiliteit en connectiviteit. DSM en de hieraan gelieerde ondernemingen genereren met ongeveer 23.000 werknemers een netto jaaromzet van ca. €10 miljard. Het bedrijf werd in 1902 opgericht en is beursgenoteerd op Euronext Amsterdam. Meer informatie vindt u op www.dsm.com.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <div>\n   Binnen de afdeling Maintenance Engineering &amp; Facilities zijn vacatures ontstaan voor:\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Maintenance Technician (MBO-niveau 3)<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   <b>Dagdienst<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>De uitdaging<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   In nauwe samenwerking met collega’s realiseer je een World Class prestatie op het gebied van SHE, kwaliteit, continu verbeteren en Maintenance performance. Vanzelfsprekend staat de veiligheid van jezelf en je collega’s altijd voorop (I care, we care). Je rapporteert aan de Teamleider Uitvoering (Do Maintenance).\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Kerntaken<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Zorgdragen voor een veilige werkomgeving en -omstandigheden binnen verantwoordelijkheidsgebied;<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful>\n  <ul>\n   <li>Realisatie van preventieve en correctieve onderhoudswerkzaamheden (First Time Right) die op World Class niveau voldoen aan kwaliteit, kwantiteit en normen m.b.t. SHE;<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful>\n  <ul>\n   <li>Integriteit van de installaties waarborgen;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Uitvoeren kleine wijzigingen en modificaties aan installaties;<\u002Fli> \n <div>\n  <div>\n   <b>DSM – Bright Science. Brighter Living.™<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Koninklijke DSM is een wereldwijd, ‘purpose-led’ bedrijf dat vanuit wetenschappelijke basis actief is op het gebied van gezondheid, voeding en duurzaam leven. DSM streeft ernaar om de kwaliteit van leven voor iedereen te verbeteren. Met zijn producten en oplossingen gaat DSM enkele van ’s werelds grootste uitdagingen aan en creëert tegelijk economische, milieutechnische en maatschappelijke waarde voor al zijn belanghebbenden – klanten, medewerkers, aandeelhouders en de samenleving in haar geheel. DSM levert innovatieve oplossingen voor voeding, diervoeding, persoonlijke verzorging en aroma’s, medische apparatuur, groene producten en toepassingen, en nieuwe mobiliteit en connectiviteit. DSM en de hieraan gelieerde ondernemingen genereren met ongeveer 23.000 werknemers een netto jaaromzet van ca. €10 miljard. Het bedrijf werd in 1902 opgericht en is beursgenoteerd op Euronext Amsterdam. Meer informatie vindt u op www.dsm.com.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <p><b>Allround E&amp;I Monteur<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n  <div>\n   <b>Explore possibilities. Empower people.<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Wat je zal doen<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   In nauwe samenwerking met collega’s realiseer je een world class prestatie op het gebied van SHE, kwaliteit, continu verbeteren, alsook preventief en correctief onderhoud, dusdanig dat de werking van installaties en apparatuur wordt gewaarborgd. Vanzelfsprekend staat de veiligheid van jezelf en je collega’s altijd voorop (volgens de regel I Care, We Care). Je rapporteert aan de Teamleider Uitvoering en bent een voorbeeld in woord en gedrag.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <i>Heb je interesse om ons te helpen onze doelen te bereiken? Heb jij wat ervoor nodig is om handen uit de mouwen te steken en aan de slag te gaan met maintenance werkzaamheden? Dan dit is jouw volgende uitdaging!<\u002Fi>\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <i><br> <\u002Fi>\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Jouw kerntaken<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Realiseren van kwalitatief hoogstaand, preventief en correctief onderhoud om de integriteit van de installaties te waarborgen.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Voldoen aan de normen op het gebied van SHE, kwaliteit en kwantiteit.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Het uitvoeren van elektrotechnisch en instrumentatietechnisch installatiebeheer en uitvoeren van kleine wijzigingen aan installaties.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Het zo adequaat mogelijk analyseren en verhelpen van storingen vanuit een hoog normbesef in dagdienst en consignatiedienst.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Het signaleren en oplossen van complexe, unieke verstoringen met als doel het beperken van de impact ervan op veiligheid, output en kwaliteit.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Rapporteren van de uitgevoerde werkzaamheden in geautomatiseerde systemen.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Actief bijdragen aan het continu verbeteren van het onderhoud, de staat van de installaties en het onderhoudsproces.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ondersteunen bij het opstellen van WI’s en TOS’sen.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Over ons<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   DSM Engineering Materials (DEM) is een wereldwijde leverancier van high-performance engineering thermoplastische oplossingen en heeft een gespecialiseerde portefeuille van producten; met elk van hen heeft DSM wereldwijd leiderschap gerealiseerd. DSM Engineering Materials is wereldwijd nummer 3 in de totale markt voor semi-kristallijne engineering plastics en is de wereldwijde marktleider in hoge-temperatuur-polyamiden.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   De site in Emmen produceert in de PA6 Plant op basis van caprolactam de polymere Polyamide 6 (nylon). Dit polymeer wordt gebruikt in textiel- en tapijtgarens en voor huishoudelijke-, industriële- en elektrotechnische toepassingen. Daarnaast worden op basis van een vijftal basis polymeren in de Compound plant, polymeren gemaakt voor specifieke toepassing onder andere door toevoeging van kleurstoffen, versterkingsmiddelen, losmiddelen, vlamvertragers en andere additieven en worden geleverd onder de naam Akulon, Arnite en Arnitel.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>We brengen<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Een team van diverse medewerkers die niet bang zijn om buiten de gebaande paden te denken.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>De aanmoediging die je nodig hebt om je te ontwikkelen en de doelen die je stelt te bereiken.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Een dynamische werkomgeving met een ervaren ondersteunend team.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>De kans om mee te groeien en jezelf te ontwikkelen in een constant groeiende industrie en om een verschil te maken voor onze stakeholders.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Je brengt<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Minimaal een afgeronde opleiding op mbo-niveau 4 elektrotechniek of gelijkwaardig.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Hoog veiligheids- en kwaliteitsbewustzijn en je weet hoe dit over te dragen op collega’s.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Aantal jaren ervaring in soortgelijke functies in een productieomgeving.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Kennis van SHE- en kwaliteitszorgsystemen en je weet hoe deze toe te passen.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Drive om continu te verbeteren, je bent proactief, geeft gevraagd en ongevraagd terugkoppeling, draagt verbetervoorstellen aan en werkt deze uit.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Sterke interpersoonlijke vaardigheden (je bent in staat om effectief te communiceren en samen te werken binnen verschillende teams.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Het vermogen om zelf beslissingen en initiatief te nemen (je weet ook hoe de juiste prioriteiten te stellen).<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Onze recruitment process<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Interesse in deze functie? Solliciteer online met het sturen van jouw CV en motivatiebrief. Mede door de nieuwe privacywetgeving, accepteren we geen sollicitaties via email. Voor eventuele vragen kun je contact opnemen met Ignacy Cieslik, Recruitment Business Partner (ignacy.cieslik@dsm.com).\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   Werken bij DSM betekent dat de kans om echt bij te dragen aan het verbeteren van het leven van mensen aan oplossingen te werken aan dagelijks uitdagingen. Met uitdagend werk, carrièremogelijkheden en een inspirerende omgeving krijgt u de kans uw persoonlijke ontwikkeling te verbeteren. DSM erkent dat het succes van de onderneming afhangt van de verdere ontwikkeling en de betrokkenheid van onze medewerkers en streeft naar een eerlijk en concurrerend beloningsbeleid en het herkennen van individuele en team competenties en prestaties.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <div>\n   Koninklijke DSM is een werkgever die gelijke kansen biedt en aan positieve discriminatie doet, en alle gekwalificeerde sollicitanten worden beoordeeld zonder te kijken naar ras, kleur, religie, geslacht, nationaliteit, leeftijd, beschermde veteranenstatus, status als gekwalificeerde persoon met een beperking, of enige andere door de wet beschermde eigenschap.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <div>\n   <b>DSM – Bright Science. Brighter Living.™<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Koninklijke DSM is een wereldwijd, ‘purpose-led’ bedrijf dat vanuit wetenschappelijke basis actief is op het gebied van gezondheid, voeding en duurzaam leven. DSM streeft ernaar om de kwaliteit van leven voor iedereen te verbeteren. Met zijn producten en oplossingen gaat DSM enkele van ’s werelds grootste uitdagingen aan en creëert tegelijk economische, milieutechnische en maatschappelijke waarde voor al zijn belanghebbenden – klanten, medewerkers, aandeelhouders en de samenleving in haar geheel. DSM levert innovatieve oplossingen voor voeding, diervoeding, persoonlijke verzorging en aroma’s, medische apparatuur, groene producten en toepassingen, en nieuwe mobiliteit en connectiviteit. DSM en de hieraan gelieerde ondernemingen genereren met ongeveer 23.000 werknemers een netto jaaromzet van ca. €10 miljard. Het bedrijf werd in 1902 opgericht en is beursgenoteerd op Euronext Amsterdam. Meer informatie vindt u op www.dsm.com.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <p><b>Allround E&amp;I Monteur<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n  <div>\n   <b>Explore possibilities. Empower people.<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Wat je zal doen<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   In nauwe samenwerking met collega’s realiseer je een world class prestatie op het gebied van SHE, kwaliteit, continu verbeteren, alsook preventief en correctief onderhoud, dusdanig dat de werking van installaties en apparatuur wordt gewaarborgd. Vanzelfsprekend staat de veiligheid van jezelf en je collega’s altijd voorop (volgens de regel I Care, We Care). Je rapporteert aan de Teamleider Uitvoering en bent een voorbeeld in woord en gedrag.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <i>Heb je interesse om ons te helpen onze doelen te bereiken? Heb jij wat ervoor nodig is om handen uit de mouwen te steken en aan de slag te gaan met maintenance werkzaamheden? Dan dit is jouw volgende uitdaging!<\u002Fi>\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <i><br> <\u002Fi>\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Jouw kerntaken<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Realiseren van kwalitatief hoogstaand, preventief en correctief onderhoud om de integriteit van de installaties te waarborgen.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Voldoen aan de normen op het gebied van SHE, kwaliteit en kwantiteit.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Het uitvoeren van elektrotechnisch en instrumentatietechnisch installatiebeheer en uitvoeren van kleine wijzigingen aan installaties.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Het zo adequaat mogelijk analyseren en verhelpen van storingen vanuit een hoog normbesef in dagdienst en consignatiedienst.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Het signaleren en oplossen van complexe, unieke verstoringen met als doel het beperken van de impact ervan op veiligheid, output en kwaliteit.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Rapporteren van de uitgevoerde werkzaamheden in geautomatiseerde systemen.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Actief bijdragen aan het continu verbeteren van het onderhoud, de staat van de installaties en het onderhoudsproces.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Ondersteunen bij het opstellen van WI’s en TOS’sen.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Over ons<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   DSM Engineering Materials (DEM) is een wereldwijde leverancier van high-performance engineering thermoplastische oplossingen en heeft een gespecialiseerde portefeuille van producten; met elk van hen heeft DSM wereldwijd leiderschap gerealiseerd. DSM Engineering Materials is wereldwijd nummer 3 in de totale markt voor semi-kristallijne engineering plastics en is de wereldwijde marktleider in hoge-temperatuur-polyamiden.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   De site in Emmen produceert in de PA6 Plant op basis van caprolactam de polymere Polyamide 6 (nylon). Dit polymeer wordt gebruikt in textiel- en tapijtgarens en voor huishoudelijke-, industriële- en elektrotechnische toepassingen. Daarnaast worden op basis van een vijftal basis polymeren in de Compound plant, polymeren gemaakt voor specifieke toepassing onder andere door toevoeging van kleurstoffen, versterkingsmiddelen, losmiddelen, vlamvertragers en andere additieven en worden geleverd onder de naam Akulon, Arnite en Arnitel.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>We brengen<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Een team van diverse medewerkers die niet bang zijn om buiten de gebaande paden te denken.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>De aanmoediging die je nodig hebt om je te ontwikkelen en de doelen die je stelt te bereiken.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Een dynamische werkomgeving met een ervaren ondersteunend team.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>De kans om mee te groeien en jezelf te ontwikkelen in een constant groeiende industrie en om een verschil te maken voor onze stakeholders.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Je brengt<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Minimaal een afgeronde opleiding op mbo-niveau 4 elektrotechniek of gelijkwaardig.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Hoog veiligheids- en kwaliteitsbewustzijn en je weet hoe dit over te dragen op collega’s.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Aantal jaren ervaring in soortgelijke functies in een productieomgeving.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Kennis van SHE- en kwaliteitszorgsystemen en je weet hoe deze toe te passen.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Drive om continu te verbeteren, je bent proactief, geeft gevraagd en ongevraagd terugkoppeling, draagt verbetervoorstellen aan en werkt deze uit.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Sterke interpersoonlijke vaardigheden (je bent in staat om effectief te communiceren en samen te werken binnen verschillende teams.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Het vermogen om zelf beslissingen en initiatief te nemen (je weet ook hoe de juiste prioriteiten te stellen).<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <br> \n  <div><\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <b>Onze recruitment process<\u002Fb>\n  <\u002Fdiv> \n  <div>\n   Interesse in deze functie? Solliciteer online met het sturen van jouw CV en motivatiebrief. Mede door de nieuwe privacywetgeving, accepteren we geen sollicitaties via email. Voor eventuele vragen kun je contact opnemen met Ignacy Cieslik, Recruitment Business Partner (ignacy.cieslik@dsm.com).\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   Werken bij DSM betekent dat de kans om echt bij te dragen aan het verbeteren van het leven van mensen aan oplossingen te werken aan dagelijks uitdagingen. Met uitdagend werk, carrièremogelijkheden en een inspirerende omgeving krijgt u de kans uw persoonlijke ontwikkeling te verbeteren. DSM erkent dat het succes van de onderneming afhangt van de verdere ontwikkeling en de betrokkenheid van onze medewerkers en streeft naar een eerlijk en concurrerend beloningsbeleid en het herkennen van individuele en team competenties en prestaties.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   <br> \n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <div>\n   Koninklijke DSM is een werkgever die gelijke kansen biedt en aan positieve discriminatie doet, en alle gekwalificeerde sollicitanten worden beoordeeld zonder te kijken naar ras, kleur, religie, geslacht, nationaliteit, leeftijd, beschermde veteranenstatus, status als gekwalificeerde persoon met een beperking, of enige andere door de wet beschermde eigenschap.\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n
